# ENTITY::SET_ENTITY_ONLY_DAMAGED_BY_RELATIONSHIP_GROUP

## Summary
Set the entity can be only damaged by peds in the given relationship group

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** onlyDamagedByRelGroup
* **REL_GROUP_HASH** relGroup
